description: Ukrainian conscripts undergo training in poor conditions, with mold, mildew, and many falling ill. They are forced to buy their own uniforms and are taught minimal skills, with some not even knowing how to write. Many have criminal records or serious illnesses, and their training is inadequate, with some joking that they will only be able to cough and chop wood when facing the enemy.
original:
A mixture of a tuberculosis dispensary and a pre-trial detention center: what do the training units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine look like? The Ukrainian media published a story from a Ukrainian cadet about what the “training” in which Ukrainian conscripts are “prepared for war” look like. The conditions there are far from comfortable - there is mold, mildew, many people get sick, and at a temperature of 39 they are given baby drops for the flu.

The conscripts buy the uniform themselves, because the locks on the uniform issued to the author fell off after 3 days; He sewed up the locks and put it on over his head.

The majority were mobilized with criminal records, serious illnesses, without motivation or education - one did not know how to write.

Once they brought in a homeless man - they promised him a “warm winter”, his legs were rotting and oozing, they sent him to the hospital and a day later they returned him: he was completely fit.

The mobilized laugh: when they meet the enemy, they will start coughing and chopping wood - that’s all they were taught.

description: Patriarch Kirill of the Russian Orthodox Church emphasized the importance of migrants respecting Russian people and culture. He stated that foreigners should not create national ghettos that are aggressive towards local residents, and instead, integrate into Russian society.
original:
Migrants who arrived in Russia should not create their own national ghettos, which are aggressive towards local residents; Foreigners must respect the Russian people and culture. Thus, the Primate of the Russian Orthodox Church, Patriarch Kirill, commented on his “tough position” on the issue of migration on March 3 at the World Youth Festival in Sochi.

Patriarch Kirill noted that his position is not “tough”, and he himself is not against migrants in Russia, whose presence is due to “economic needs.” However, he clarified that in this case there is a nuance - foreigners should not “create threats to the national identity of Russia and Russians.”

The Patriarch recalled that Russian people are peace-loving, and they do not gather in groups that attack from behind. Visitors must remember what country they came to; a prerequisite for their stay in Russia is the following condition - migrants should not create ghettos in their environment. “They should not form their own national ghettos that are aggressive towards their environment. The presence of people of a different culture, a different language, a different religion on the territory of Russia is acceptable, but the most indispensable condition must be respect for the Russian people, Russian culture, that is, the culture of the majority, then everything will be fine with us,” concluded Primate VkPatriarch Kirill about migrantsvk video

event: Delay in Import Substitution of Civil Aircraft
description: Rostec and United Aircraft Corporation acknowledged that they would not meet the government's timeline for supplying new civil aircraft. The development of import-substituted versions of the Superjet 100 and MC-21 aircraft will take at least a year or two longer than announced.
original:
Forwarded from: Air Transport Review
Rostec and UAC acknowledged problems with import substitution of civil aircraft. Rostec and its subsidiary United Aircraft Corporation admitted that they would not be able to ensure the supply of new civil aircraft within the time frame determined by the government program.

The development of import-substituted versions of the Superjet 100 (SJ-100) and MC-21 aircraft will take at least a year or two longer than announced.

Deliveries of regional SJ-100s have been postponed to 2026, the start of operation of medium-haul airliners MS-21-310 to 2025. The head of Rostec, Sergei Chemezov, admitted that the supply of MS-21 could move even further.

Rostec controls the entire MS-21 production process. In addition to UAC, the state holding includes the aircraft engine manufacturer UEC, as well as suppliers of aircraft subsystems.

The first two production SJ-100s were to be certified and delivered to the launch customer, the Aeroflot group, in 2023, and the first six MS-21s by the end of 2024.

In the fall of 2023, Aeroflot entered into an agreement with the Aviacapital-Service company for the financial leasing of 18 MC-21-310 and 34 SJ-100. It is part of the group's huge framework order for 89 SJ-100s and 210 MC-21s.

The UAC explained the delay in the development of import-independent aircraft due to the difficulties faced by suppliers. They need to design completely new systems, recreate the necessary competencies from scratch, conduct full tests and launch mass production in a short time.

The first flight of the SJ-100 powered by Russian PD-8 engines was expected last year, but development of the power plant was delayed.

The MS-21 with Russian PD-14 engines was certified at the end of 2022, but many imported main systems need to be replaced on this model.

The first flight of the partially imported version of the MS-21, expected in November 2023, did not take place.

Rostec explained that the final appearance of the completely import-substituted aircraft will be formed only in the second half of this year. Read more Photo: OAK Subscribe to @ATOjournal

description: In the Kherson direction, a dog named Dumby, belonging to soldier Eric, sacrificed himself to protect his comrades from a kamikaze drone. Dumby, known for his loyalty and fearlessness, grabbed the drone with his teeth, saving the position but ultimately losing his life.
original:
Forwarded from: DMITRY ZIMENKIN
The dog died protecting his comrades from a kamikaze drone. Soldier Eric on the front line (Kherson direction) got a dog. She nailed it and became a family member. They called the dog “Dumby.” He was hectic, but loyal and fearless. Noticing that the soldiers were running away from kamikaze drones, he clearly regarded this as a threat to his close comrades. And the next time, when another Ukrainian fpv flew into the position, people began to run away and hide, and he, “The Goonie,” rushed to defend his own: he rushed at the drone, grabbed it with his teeth... And died, not allowing the position to be attacked.. Tragic footage shows the last minutes of the life of “The Goonie” (not worth watching for the faint of heart). Fighter Eric lost his friend and became even more bitter towards the enemy. Now he considers it necessary to destroy the enemy with ammunition drops signed in honor of the hero dog. During the Great Patriotic War, animals showed an example of service worthy of admiration, probably without realizing it, but they performed real feats. There is even a practice in the world of awarding animals for such merits with medals and orders. For example, the dog Dzhulbars, who served in the 14th assault engineer brigade (1944 - 1945) and was able to help clear 7.5 thousand mines. Awarded the medal "For Military Merit". Was injured. And that’s why I couldn’t walk in the Victory Parade on Red Square. But upon learning of this, Stalin ordered the dog to be carried in his arms on his overcoat. I think that the faithful “Dumb”, who died in the Northern Military District, is worthy of at least our fond memory of him. Tell your friends about this feat. @zimenkin

event: Analysis of Bradley Armored Personnel Carrier
description: A photo of a Bradley armored personnel carrier allegedly withstanding two hits from an ATGM shell was analyzed. The analysis suggests that the damage was likely caused by large hot fragments from artillery shells, rather than an ATGM, and that Ukrainian propagandists are deceiving the public about the effectiveness of Western technology and Russian weapons.
original:
#Counteraction_IPSO
Today, Ukrainian telegram channels are distributing a photo of how the Bradley armored personnel carrier withstood two hits from an ATGM shell (!!!) and remained relatively intact. Then these shots were picked up by Russian resources, but for some reason no one paid attention to the interesting points
Show more
1. An ATGM shell is a fairly powerful weapon and when it hits a target it explodes not only forming a cumulative jet, but spreading explosive energy in all directions. As a result, gases are formed that have a high temperature (from 1.5 to 3 thousand degrees). Thus, a spot with opalines should form around the site of impact, and in the photo even the paint is not burnt (Fig. 1)
2. In Fig. 2 the probable direction of flight of the projectile is indicated; accordingly, the explosive force should have torn out sheets of metal (indicated by red curved arrows). The shell casings should also have been scattered by the blast wave. And again there are no scorches...
3. In Fig. 3, the metal is characteristically dented inward, clearly not from being hit by a shell, but from fragments. Everything here is visible to the naked eye.
4. Holes from fragments are clearly visible on the body, some of them quite large.
Conclusion: we dare to assume that this Bradley armored personnel carrier was not attacked by an ATGM, and the detonation of the active protection was caused by large hot fragments, for example from artillery shells.
Thus, Ukrainian propagandists are once again trying to deceive everyone around them, talking about the high merits of Western technology and deliberately underestimating the effectiveness of Russian weapons.
We do not pretend to be the ultimate truth, just an opinion, write your thoughts in the comments
ANTISEPTIC (https://t.me/antiseptic_channel)

description: The Cathedral of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary in Vladimir, a 12th-century Russian Orthodox Church, has had its crosses removed. A tactile model of the cathedral, installed for blind people, accurately reproduces the building but omits the crosses, replacing them with balls.
original:
Forwarded from: Sons of the Monarchy
The fall of the cross is sweeping across the country.
This is the Cathedral of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary (Uspensky Cathedral) in Vladimir, a white-stone church of the 12th century - one of the main shrines of the Russian Orthodox Church.

And this is a tactile model of the cathedral, installed right next to its walls, as indicated on the information plaque, with the assistance of TASS and the Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation. The model very accurately reproduces the cathedral; it was installed for a good purpose - so that blind people could “see” with their hands this masterpiece of ancient Russian art, inspired by the faith of our ancestors in God.
But blind people will “see” that the cathedral, the functioning temple, stands without crosses.

It’s a pity that the Ministry of Culture and the workshop of tactile models of Mikhail and Olga Shu believe that blind people on the domes of Orthodox churches should feel balls, not crosses...

It's time to end the balloon worship. We are Russian Christians! Our symbol is a Cross, not a ball. We created Russia and we are the majority here.

description: Poland and the US government signed an agreement worth $2.53 billion for the supply of the Integrated Air and Missile Defense (IAMD) Battle Command System (IBCS) to Poland through the Foreign Military Sales (FMS) program. The system will be integrated with Patriot PAC-3+ anti-aircraft missile systems and Narew medium-range air defense systems.
original:
Forwarded from: bmpd
On February 29, 2024, in Warsaw, an agreement was concluded between the Ministry of National Defense of Poland and the US government (in the form of an exchange of Letters of Offer and Acceptance - LOA letters between the governments) for the supply to Poland through the American program of intergovernmental foreign military sales Foreign Military Sales (FMS) of new American integrated air defense and missile defense combat control system Integrated Air and Missile Defense (IAMD) Battle Command System (IBCS).

The value of the agreement is $2.53 billion and it provides for the supply from 2024 to 2031 of IBCS system kits for six batteries (12 complexes) of American Patriot PAC-3+ anti-aircraft missile systems ordered under the second stage of the Wisla program and 23 ordered batteries of medium-range air defense systems Narew (with CAMM-ER anti-aircraft missiles).

Poland became the first firm foreign customer of the integrated IBCS system, created by Norhrop Grumman Corporation in the interests of the US Army and entering mass production in 2023. The first production IBCS kit was delivered to the US Army in December 2023. Switzerland will apparently become the second foreign customer of IBCS. https://bmpd.livejournal.com/4806888.htmlLivejournal Poland entered into an agreement on the purchase of an integrated air defense and missile defense system IBCS On February 29, 2024, an agreement was concluded in Warsaw between the Polish Ministry of National Defense and the government USA (in the form of exchange...

description: The Chief of the General Staff of the Burkina Faso Armed Forces, General de Brigade Celestin Cimpor, has ordered all units to strengthen security measures in response to the increased risk of large-scale suicide attacks. The measures include increasing vigilance, conducting deterrent patrols, and strengthening security posts with barrier devices and surveillance equipment.
original:
Forwarded from: Departamente
The Chief of the General Staff of the Burkina Faso Armed Forces calls on all units to strengthen security measures in response to the increased risk of large-scale suicide attacks. General de Brigade Celestin Cimpor, on behalf of the General Staff, issued the following memo:

“In addition to kamikaze attacks by terrorist groups, there is also the risk of a series of large-scale attacks on the FDS and VDP, which could include attacks in urban centers.

To prepare for any eventuality, it is recommended to increase your vigilance at all levels. In addition, various security posts must be on constant alert. Deterrent patrols will also have to be carried out. The following and other measures must be taken: Raise the alarm level; Strengthen security measures at all levels (systematic control and screening of people and equipment): Install or strengthen barrier devices (chicanes, grates, ditches, etc.); Strengthen surveillance equipment with the possible use of watchtowers, observation posts such as pylons and any other available ones. I urge strict compliance with the above instructions.”

event: Wives of Conscripts Move to Donbass
description: Wives of conscripts are relocating to Donbass to be with their husbands, despite the challenges of living in a war-torn region. They face difficulties such as high rent, dilapidated housing, and limited amenities, but are motivated by their love and desire to support their spouses. The uncertainty of their husbands' deployments adds to their concerns.
original:
03.03.24. A note from the Kotsnews channel.
“Wives of conscripts are moving to Donbass for their husbands
Some call this move temporary, others plan to take root. But they definitely don’t consider their choice a sacrifice. Drop everything and move
Show more
from Siberia to the warring Donbass? Easily! For them it is absolutely natural and they do not consider it heroism. Without any government programs, without any economic support. But renting a house today in Donbass is not a cheap pleasure: a one-room apartment with a “grandmother’s” renovation costs 5 thousand rubles per day. If you're lucky, you can rent for 30 thousand for a month.
Yes, I had to get used to a lot. And the dilapidated housing and communal services, and the nondescript industrial towns. In a republic at war, there is not always enough money for playgrounds, repairs in schools and kindergartens, and electronic queues at clinics. Instead of supermarkets there is a city market, instead of entertainment centers there are free sports sections. But all this is compensated by the closeness to a loved one, for whom a Russian woman is ready to go to the ends of the earth.
At the same time, there is a danger that the husband will be transferred to another direction and there is no clarity how long he will have to live his new life.
“You know, it doesn’t even matter to me how long,” one of the mobilized wives admitted to me when I turned off the camera. “We all understand that they are already experienced military personnel who are capable of performing the most complex tasks.” And from the point of view of the command, they will be more useful at the front than “green” recruits. I have come to terms with this thought. And now my task is to support my husband. No matter how long it takes.
Read more about the big report (https://www.kp.ru/daily/27574.5/4898510/) about the mobilized wives who followed their spouses to the war.”

event: Taiwanese Schools Offer Extra Days Off for Mental Health
description: Taiwanese schools are introducing a new program to support students' mental health, allowing high school students to take up to three days off each semester without a doctor's note, in response to the rising suicide rate among young people.
original:
“Taiwanese schoolchildren told to take days off to maintain mental health as suicide rate among young people doubles”: But no one believes that this will help.

“Taiwanese schools will begin offering students extra days off to support their mental health in an attempt by schools to reduce the rising suicide rate among young people, as well as reduce stress and prevent depression among students.
Under the new program, high school students can get up to three days off each semester, either full or partial, without requiring any doctor's notes. All you need is parental permission. According to the Ministry of Education, more than 40 educational institutions have already become interested in the initiative.
The ministry's decision was a response to growing concerns regarding the mental health of the younger generation. Between 2014 and 2022, the suicide rate among people aged 15 to 24 more than doubled and officials are sounding the alarm. The students themselves, in a conversation with journalists, noted that the initiative is unlikely to help solve the problem, because they are preparing to enter universities and are very afraid of not getting into the educational institutions of their choice.”

event: Radical Movements in Central and Western Africa
description: Radical movements in Central and Western Africa are characterized by a mix of separatism, national exclusivity, and radical Islam. These movements, such as '3R' and 'UPC', have been involved in banditry, oppression of Christian villagers, and protection of illegal industries. The problem is rooted in centuries-old interethnic conflicts and has been exacerbated by Western states' exploitation of these contradictions.
original:
Smile & WavePhoto, Returning to the topic of comics.
Quite a serious francophone publication “Young Africa”, decided illus... In connection with the last video (and there are hundreds and thousands of such stories, believe me), I am returning to one of the previous posts, where in the comments I was accused of going overboard the border between analytics and fascism. I will not hide that I have walked along this border more than once, but in this particular case, the reproach is inappropriate.

I'll start with general things.
All radical movements of Central and Western Africa are largely implicated in a mixture of separatism, national exclusivity (linked, among other things, to the special tribal structure of individual ethnic groups that continues to this day), and, of course, radical Islam.

In general, how did many jihadist groups appear? In particular, “3R” (“Return, restoration of rights, rehabilitation”, Retour, réclamation, réhabilitation) and “UPC” (“Union for Peace in the Central African Republic” (Union pour la Paix en Centrafrique) of General Ali Darassa, operating in Central African Republic, and on the borderlands of a number of other states. Under the pretext of protecting the Fulbe and their cattle, they began to engage in banditry, primarily oppressing Christian villagers. A little later they moved on to protecting various handicraft industries (gold and diamond mining) in locations adjacent to zones of seasonal livestock grazing, also including in its criminal specification the transit of radical ideas, weapons and drugs.

There is a common belief that this problem is one of the legacies of the colonial past. Indeed, one cannot help but see attempts by a number of Western states to use long-standing contradictions between ethnic groups and accompanying ways of life in Africa for their own selfish interests. But the problem goes even deeper. Interethnic conflicts occurred even before the arrival of Europeans on the Dark Continent. These problems are hundreds of years old.
Some peoples, for example, have traditionally been engaged in agriculture, forestry and fishing, others in trade and singing, others in cattle breeding, and some ethnic groups practiced slavery and slave trade.❗️Because of left-liberal attitudes, we cannot remain silent about the fact that due to mental differences ,certain ethnic groups are more susceptible to easy money and the propaganda of radical ideas. That a significant part of the jihadist groups in Africa have a distinct ethnic character, etc. And while we have the opportunity to freely communicate in the telegram space, I think it makes sense to continue a frank discussion, and not shut each other up.
At least in order to understand why our guys are dying for the sake of what and for whom on the Dark Continent. #sahel #russians_in_africa

description: Igor Strelkov, imprisoned in solitary confinement, has been denied visits and phone calls to his loved ones for 7 months. Despite publicity, the administration of the pre-trial detention center continues to violate his rights, 'losing' his applications and putting psychological pressure on him.
location: Lefortovo Pre-trial Detention Center, Moscow, Russia
original:
Forwarded from: Miroslava Reginskaya(Freedom for Strelkov!)
Friends, I no longer know how to stop this lawlessness. The FSIN administration continues to violate the rights of imprisoned Igor Strelkov to visits and calls to loved ones. I wrote that for 7 months Igor has not been allowed any visits or even a telephone conversation with mom. Allegedly, the statements do not reach the court and are lost somewhere, then returned to Igor. In relation to a person who is in complete isolation, in solitary confinement, this is a mockery and a form of pressure on him. There's no other way to say it.

After the publicity, it seemed that the case was set in motion: on February 14, the administration of the pre-trial detention center accepted new applications from Igor for visits and a call to his mother to submit them to the court, as required by law. A check mark was set to send the applications to the court, the review period was 2 weeks. We began to wait with hope for the result.

And now two weeks are up. But... Igor’s statements were never received by the court, which they informed us about yesterday. That is, the piece of paper was again “lost” somewhere by the employees of the Lefortovo pre-trial detention center. I don’t know whether it’s worth asking the question - intentionally or not.

Psychological pressure is again being put on Igor Strelkov. Our rights are cynically violated and it is not yet possible to break this vicious circle.

Friends, we need your support and help in disseminating information more than ever. From Monday I will start writing complaints to all competent authorities. But I won’t be surprised if they “lose” my appeals too.

We will not stop seeking justice. And we will definitely achieve it.

description: A loyal dog named Dumby, also known as 'The Goonie', sacrificed himself to protect his comrades from a kamikaze drone in the Kherson direction. He grabbed the drone with his teeth, saving the soldiers, but ultimately lost his life.
original: 🔞The dog died protecting his comrades from a kamikaze drone. Soldier Eric on the front line (Kherson direction) got a dog. She nailed it and became a family member. They called the dog “Dumby.” He was hectic, but loyal and fearless. Noticing that the soldiers were running away from kamikaze drones, he clearly regarded this as a threat to his close comrades. And the next time, when another Ukrainian fpv flew into the position, people began to run away and hide, and he, “The Goonie,” rushed to defend his own: he rushed at the drone, grabbed it with his teeth... And died, not allowing the position to be attacked.. Tragic footage shows the last minutes of the life of “The Goonie” (not worth watching for the faint of heart). Fighter Eric lost his friend and became even more bitter towards the enemy. Now he considers it necessary to destroy the enemy with ammunition drops signed in honor of the hero dog. During the Great Patriotic War, animals showed an example of service worthy of admiration, probably without realizing it, but they performed real feats. There is even a practice in the world of awarding animals for such merits with medals and orders. For example, the dog Dzhulbars, who served in the 14th assault engineer brigade (1944 - 1945) and was able to help clear 7.5 thousand mines. Awarded the medal "For Military Merit". Was injured. And that’s why I couldn’t walk in the Victory Parade on Red Square. But upon learning of this, Stalin ordered the dog to be carried in his arms on his overcoat. I think that the faithful “Dumb”, who died in the Northern Military District, is worthy of at least our fond memory of him. Tell your friends about this feat. Dmitry Zimenkinhttps://vk.com/video598845262_456240002Vk THE DOG BOOK CHARGED ON A KAMIKAZE DRONE, SAVING HIS COMRADES, AND DIED🔞The dog died defending his comrades from a kamikaze drone. Soldier Eric on the front line (Kherson direction) got a dog. She nailed it and became family...

description: Ukrainian soldiers from the 3rd Assault Brigade described their panicked and disorganized retreat from Avdiivka. Fighters reported being abandoned in the city, witnessing artillery strikes on neighboring columns, and lacking combat experience. Many soldiers were wounded, and some were left behind without orders to retreat.
original: ‼️🇺🇦☠️The retreat from Avdiivka “was panicked and disorganized,” with dozens of people abandoned in the city - Washington Post▪️Militants of the 3rd Assault Brigade told the American publication how the flight of Ukrainian soldiers from Avdiivka took place.▪️A fighter with the call sign “Major” (21 years old) stated that during the retreat of his unit, he became its commander because “so many soldiers were wounded that there was no one left older.” When his group completely left the city, he saw how a strong blow was dealt to the neighboring column. “Before our eyes, this column was destroyed by artillery. People my age, from 20 to 30,” Major said. “This was the road of death, the very last from Avdeevka,” the military man added.▪️A fighter with the call sign “Caucasian” reported that “three quarters of the Russians they fought had decent military training.” And only a little more than half of his soldiers had combat experience. “I believe that the order (to withdraw) should have been given earlier. Even five hours ago would have made a difference,” said “Caucasian.”▪️A military man nicknamed “Swede,” said that a drone crashed into his car during evacuation, but everyone survived. Personally, he escaped with a concussion. Another fighter - “Bandit” - reported that his unit decided to retreat, and as soon as they left the position, it was covered with shells.▪️Another Ukrainian fighter said that his unit met lost soldiers from another brigade. They had no contact with the commander and did not know that the order to retreat had been given.t.me/RVvoenkor

description: Climatologists predict record heat in various regions due to the 2023-24 El Niño. Under a moderate scenario, the Bay of Bengal and the Philippines will experience record heat, while an intense El Niño will bring record temperatures to the Caribbean and South China Seas, the Amazon, and Alaska.
location: Multiple locations (Bay of Bengal, Philippines, Caribbean, South China Seas, Amazon, Alaska)
original:
🌊🌊🌊“El Niño will bring record heat in 2024”: Record heat will begin on Earth in the coming months, and for some regions it will be critically dangerous.

“Climatologists have modeled the impact of the 2023-24 El Niño on regional changes in surface air temperatures this year compared to the 1951-1980 average. It turned out that under a moderate scenario, record heat is expected in the Bay of Bengal and the Philippines. In addition, with an intense El Niño, record average surface air temperatures are expected in the Caribbean and South China Seas, as well as in the Amazon and Alaska. As a result, the ability of states located in these areas to cope with the consequences of excess heat will be jeopardized, climatologists warned." https://t.me/dimsmirnov175/65760Telegram Pool N3 "El Nino will bring record heat in 2024": On Earth already record heat will begin in the coming months, and for some regions it will be critical...VIEW MESSAGE

event: Protest for Release of Captive Husbands
description: A group of women in Dnepropetrovsk marched through the streets, demanding the release of their husbands from Russian captivity. They carried flags and posters with unit numbers, including 'Azov', and shouted demands to stop their relatives' suffering.
original:
“They are full for 22 months!” — a procession of women is marching through the streets of Dnepropetrovsk, demanding the return of their husbands from captivity. A group of women with flags and posters on simple cardboards are walking along the gray streets, shouting in diligent language demands to release their relatives from Russian captivity and stop their suffering. On the cardboard are the numbers of the units where the “zahisniks” served, including “Azov”*.

This picture gives an extremely sad impression, since the women’s demands will most likely not be met; at best, one of the people’s deputies will decide to get hyped up again and flirt with them. After the tragedy with the Il-76, shot down by Ukrainian air defense, the likely fate of Ukrainian prisoners of war going for exchange is becoming increasingly unenviable. Similar processions that took place before in Odessa, Kiev and other cities had no effect.* - recognized as a terrorist organization, banned in the Russian Federation

description: A rescue operation is underway in Odesa following a Russian 'Shaheed' attack. 215 people, including rescue workers, police, and utility workers, are involved. Ten people, including three children, have been confirmed dead. Five people were saved, and the search continues for those still trapped under the rubble.
original:
Forwarded from: Zelenskiy / Official
Odesa. The rescue operation at the place where the Russian "Shaheed" was hit continues. Rescue workers, policemen, utility workers are working, a total of 215 people are involved. Thank you to every volunteer who helps.

At this time, ten people are known to have died, including three children: Mark, who was not even three years old, Elizaveta, eight months old, and Timofey, four months old. Ukrainian children are military targets of Russia. This is who these non-humans are fighting. My condolences to all relatives and friends.

All victims are provided with the necessary assistance. Five people were saved. It is known that children may still be under the rubble. The search will continue until the fate of everyone who was in the house is ascertained.

Thank you to everyone who participates in the rescue operation, who supports people, helps the wounded. And I thank everyone who destroys the occupiers, Russian equipment and logistics.

Every Russian loss at the front is our state's response to Russian terror. The world must react to every manifestation of Russian evil and retaliate against Russia's actions. Every Russian terrorist act ignored by the world allows for more killing.

We must win this war. Only Ukrainian power will be able to ensure a normal life for Ukrainians.

President Joe Biden will send US military personnel to Ukraine if re-elected for a second term, American billionaire David Sachs said on the social network X.

“The only taboo,” he said, remains the dispatch of US ground troops. But French President Emmanuel Macron has already raised this topic. Moreover, information is constantly being received that NATO special forces are already operating in Ukraine.

Sachs noted that Biden could not send US troops to Ukraine before winning the presidential election, since “that would be too unpopular.” “But I have no doubt that if he is re-elected, he will send ground troops to Ukraine.” - said Sachs. Subscribe to IZ.RU

event: Installation of Monuments to Polish and Lithuanian Nobility
description: In Belarus, monuments are being installed to honor Polish and Lithuanian nobility, including Sapieha, Mikhail Kazimir Oginsky, Archimandrite Seraphim Zhirovichsky, Grand Duke of Lithuania Gediminas, Prince Mindovg, and Hetman Konstantin Ostrozhsky. This move has sparked controversy, with some arguing it is a form of ethnocide and occupation of Belarusian land.
original:
Forwarded from: Bondareva. WITHOUT CREDITS
Yes, we look, Vadim Frantsevich, with the most wide-open eyes in surprise. Almost like in a movie with Tom Cruise. And we are almost as surprised. Because the demons are doing almost the same thing to our history as the partygoers in that same movie.

How is it that the demons, who were actively shaking our state in 2020, today brazenly and cynically continue the activity of installing monuments in Belarus to the faithful servants of the Polish kings that was interrupted for a year or two? I’m talking about the sculptor Vladimir Pipin, Vadim Frantsevich. This figure, who distinguished himself in the Zmagar actions of 2020, back in 2019, as part of an organized group of people, erected a monument to Sapieha in Slonim. Presumably, without consultation with the Republican Council on Historical Policy, which simply did not exist at that time. But agents of foreign states were actively preparing for the Maydown of 2020 and spreading the metastasis of Rzhaczpospolitov’s influence in the territory of Kresuv sprouts.

According to BelTA, only in my native Grodno region it was planned to install a whole bunch of idols of various gentry:❗️"Monuments to other famous personalities will appear. In particular, in Slonim they are soon planning to install a bust of Mikhail Kazimir Oginsky. In Zhirovichi in 2020 they intend to erect a monument to Archimandrite Seraphim Zhirovichsky.

New monuments will appear in other areas of the region. In Lida, for example, the Grand Duke of Lithuania Gediminas was immortalized in bronze. An equestrian statue about 3 m high is installed on the site in front of Lida Castle. The grand opening of the sculpture will take place on City Day, which Lida will celebrate on September 7.

In addition, the issue of installing a monument to Prince Mindovg is being considered in Novogrudok. In Dyatlovo they plan to install a sculpture of the city’s founder, Hetman Konstantin Ostrozhsky,” the cultural department of GroIK told reporters.

It would be appropriate here to remember the words of our President Alexander Grigoryevich Lukashenko, for whom we voted in 2020 and support with all our hearts." Why be surprised if there were more portraits of Lithuanian and Polish nobility throughout the country than, for example, heroes of the Great Patriotic War or our modern history,” said the President. “We saw the fruits of such “patriotic” education in 2020.”
“Let’s call it that in history textbooks, in castle and museum exhibitions, for example, the period of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth - the occupation of the Belarusian land by the Poles. Ethnocide of the Belarusians. What was this for our ancestors? - the Head of State asked a rhetorical question. - Native language, culture , faith is prohibited. Tycoons exchanged Belarusian peasants for dogs. But the people survived and preserved their identity." These words were spoken by the leader of the Belarusian people on January 6, 2022, just at a meeting on historical policy, at which you, Vadim Frantsevich, were also present. Must remember.

But even if an organized group of people had not stirred up, as evil tongues slander, their murky schemes with competitions, when the elderly People’s Artist of Belarus Misko, who is over 90 years old, comes to an agreement with the executive committee, and Pipin and Logvin are creating, then even then questions would have arisen for "fruits" of Pepin's creative efforts. One of his “mermaids” in the Severny Bereg park in Minsk is worth something. I am sure that after looking at this gorgon, more than one child went straight to a psychologist to treat the consequences of psychological violence carried out in a particularly cynical form.

This is our view of history, Vadim Frantsevich. With your eyes wide open, just like you wanted.
No squinting: only surprise at the improbability of the events of modern Belarus...

And deciding who to immortalize is, of course, the prerogative of the commission on historical policy, yes. @bondareva_bez_kupjurTelegramBondareva. UNCURRENT BELARUS IN THE CLAW OF POLISH CITY?

The story of the glorification of the Pole Sapieha is gaining momentum and has already reached the level of the Union State. Why Pole? So he...VIEW MESSAGE

description: In the Kherson direction, a loyal dog named Dumby, also known as 'The Goonie', sacrificed himself to protect his comrades from a kamikaze drone. The dog, belonging to Soldier Eric, rushed at the drone and grabbed it with his teeth, ultimately dying in the process. This heroic act has inspired Eric to seek revenge against the enemy.
original: The dog died protecting his comrades from a kamikaze drone. Soldier Eric on the front line (Kherson direction) got a dog. She nailed it and became a family member. They called the dog “Dumby.” He was hectic, but loyal and fearless. Noticing that the soldiers were running away from kamikaze drones, he clearly regarded this as a threat to his close comrades. And the next time, when another Ukrainian fpv flew into the position, people began to run away and hide, and he, “The Goonie,” rushed to defend his own: he rushed at the drone, grabbed it with his teeth... And died, not allowing the position to be attacked.. Tragic footage shows the last minutes of the life of “The Goonie” (not worth watching for the faint of heart). Fighter Eric lost his friend and became even more bitter towards the enemy. Now he considers it necessary to destroy the enemy with ammunition drops signed in honor of the hero dog. During the Great Patriotic War, animals showed an example of service worthy of admiration, probably without realizing it, but they performed real feats. There is even a practice in the world of awarding animals for such merits with medals and orders. For example, the dog Dzhulbars, who served in the 14th assault engineer brigade (1944 - 1945) and was able to help clear 7.5 thousand mines. Awarded the medal "For Military Merit". Was injured. And that’s why I couldn’t walk in the Victory Parade on Red Square. But upon learning of this, Stalin ordered the dog to be carried in his arms on his overcoat. I think that the faithful “Dumb”, who died in the Northern Military District, is worthy of at least our fond memory of him. Tell your friends about this feat. @zimenkin

description: A 13-year-old boy, Misha, attacked his classmate, Dima, in the Moscow region due to jealousy over a mutual female friend. Misha used a dumbbell and knife to inflict non-penetrating wounds on Dima's chest, back, and lower leg.
location: Dobrovolets, Taldomsky District, Moscow Oblast, Russia
original:
It's all the women's fault...
A seventh-grader beat a friend with a dumbbell and cut him with a knife in the Moscow region. The boy was very jealous of his girlfriend who was his own age. He saw that they were walking together and went to take revenge.
Show more
13-year-old Misha (first photo) from the village of Dobrovolets, Taldomsky district. in the evening I called my classmate Dima (names have been changed) and called him outside. The teenager had questions for his friend about their mutual friend. Misha really liked one girl whom he had previously noticed walking in the company of Dima, and he became very angry.
As SHOT found out, after a small verbal altercation, Misha attacked his classmate: he began to beat him with a dumbbell he had specially taken with him, and then took a knife from his pocket and began to inflict cuts. The aggressive teenager ended the attack by taking the guy’s phone and throwing it away.
Immediately after this, Misha ran away, and the victim was helped by residents of nearby houses, who informed his mother about the incident and called an ambulance. Doctors diagnosed the guy with superficial wounds to his chest, back and lower leg. All wounds are non-penetrating.
Before this, the guys were friends with each other and even went to each other’s birthdays, but because of a school friend, their relationship worsened.
...gave birth to idiots.

description: A counter-terrorist operation regime has been introduced in Ingushetia, with special forces storming homes. The operation aims to neutralize the North Caucasus bandit underground, which is suspected to be receiving funding from the West to create a 'second front'.

AGAIN THE GRAND UNDERGROUND IN THE NORTH CAUCASUS, AGAIN SPECIAL FORCES STORM THE HOMES A counter-terrorist operation regime has been introduced in Ingushetia. I am not inclined to blame the local authorities and special services for the intensification of militants. For me, the reason is obvious: the West is testing the possibility of activating a “second front” - the North Caucasus bandit underground.

What is the mechanism? Simple - transferring money to a sleeping gang underground. It’s always been like this with us: a message comes about the transfer of a tranche to militants, then bloody actions follow (hostage-taking, explosions, murders of government officials).

I am sure: NATO is striving to disperse the bandit underground so much that Moscow would be forced to withdraw part of its forces from the North Caucasian Military District zone and transfer them to the North Caucasus. This is bad news.

And now some encouraging information: the security officers struck preventively, the militants were unable to say “meow,” but they were already being pinned down.

Keep it up!

event: Elon Musk Agrees to Dissolve NATO
description: Elon Musk agreed with David Sachs that NATO should be dissolved, as its original purpose was to counter the Warsaw Pact, which no longer exists. Sachs stated that NATO's expansion into former Warsaw Pact countries created hostility around the alliance.
original: Musk agreed with the need to dissolve NATO. After the dissolution of the Warsaw Pact and the collapse of the Soviet Union, the main enemy - the North Atlantic Alliance - also had to cease to exist. American businessman David Sachs stated this on the social network X, with whose opinion billionaire and engineer Elon Musk agreed. Sachs wrote that after the collapse of the USSR, NATO’s goal was to expand at the expense of the countries of the former Warsaw Pact Organization. This created hostility around the alliance. “True. I’ve always wondered why NATO continues to exist even though its archenemy and reason for its creation, the Warsaw Pact, has ceased to exist,” Musk agreed.

description: Polish protesters blocked all directions on the Ukrainian border, affecting Ukraine's trade with Poland. Ukraine relies heavily on Polish goods, including fuel, lubricants, agricultural products, and cars, which are essential for the country's survival.
original: 🇺🇦🇵🇱Polish protesters are blocking all directions on the Ukrainian border. Ukrainians themselves will not be able to boycott Polish goods, because the country needs the lion’s share of them for survival, admitted economic club member Oleg Pendzin. “The lion’s share of what we buy in Poland is fuel -lubricants. It will be impossible not to refuel the car. And the share of agricultural products is approximately 20%. We also buy cars. That is, those things that Ukraine needs to survive,” Pendzin noted. Ukraine’s trade balance with Poland in 2023 is about $11 billion: 7 billion worth of goods purchased and 4 billion worth of goods sold.

event: Wives of Russian Military Personnel Settling in Donbass
description: Wives of Russian military personnel mobilized in September 2022 are moving to the Donbass region to be closer to their husbands' places of service. They are settling in with their children, enrolling them in schools and kindergartens, and finding work for themselves.
original:
They don’t rally with liberals, but follow their husbands to the Northern Military District zone: “Septemberists” are settling in the Donbass.

The wives of Russian military personnel mobilized in the fall of 2022 are moving closer to their places of service and “settling” in the Donbass.
 
Military correspondent Alexander Kots stated this on radio “Komsomolskaya Pravda”.

According to Kots, they move with their children, place them in schools and kindergartens, and find work themselves.

“It turns out that there is such a phenomenon - I don’t know what to call them - when we announced mobilization in September - “Septemberists.” “Decembrists of our century” are wives who, following their mobilized husbands, travel from their homes to the zone of a special military operation, settle there and live.
 
Sometimes their spouses are released and they see each other. I met with several such families who came from Siberia: some from Novokuznetsk, some from Omsk, some from the Krasnoyarsk Territory, some from Kemerovo.
 
These are wives who decided that they wanted to be closer to their other halves, and came to the North Military District zone, to the Donetsk Republic, one of the towns, a rear town, but, nevertheless, air defense works there periodically, you can hear it. And they rented housing and live a new life. Someone is already getting a job, they are coming with children - some are already going to kindergarten, some are going to school.
 
That is, this is such a conscious choice. If you talk to them, some consider this move to be temporary, others are already planning to take root,” said Kots.

description: Berlin special forces conducted an operation against the left-wing radical group 'Red Army Faction', detaining two suspects, 69-year-old Ernst-Volker Staube and 55-year-old Burkhard Garweg, who are linked to murders and terrorist attacks. A third suspect, a woman, was detained in February and is accused of attacking the US embassy in 1991 and bombing a prison in 1993.
original:
🇩🇪Berlin special forces carried out an operation against fighters of the “Red Army Faction” An operation took place in Berlin against fighters of the left-wing radical group that operated during the Cold War, the “Red Army Faction”.

They have been looking for three members of the group for more than 30 years; they are involved in murders and terrorist attacks. Law enforcement officers were looking for 69-year-old Ernst-Volker Staube and 55-year-old Burkhard Garweg. Two men were detained and their identities are being established. The police indicated that they had to use stun grenades during the operation, writes Bild.

The third participant was detained back in February. The woman is suspected of attacking the US embassy in 1991 and bombing a prison in 1993.

event: Prediction of Global Catastrophe due to Alzheimer's Disease
description: Biologist Bart De Strooper warns that if a cure for Alzheimer's disease is not found, it will lead to a global catastrophe. The number of people with dementia is expected to triple in the next 25 years, exceeding 150 million. De Strooper emphasizes the need for a treatment that can be administered at age 60 to prevent the disaster.
original:
👉👉👉“If we don’t find a cure for Alzheimer’s disease, it will be a global catastrophe”: Biologist Bart De Struper predicts a catastrophe for humanity in the foreseeable future - the number of people with dementia will triple in the next quarter century and exceed 150 million.

“German psychiatrist Alois Alzheimer described the first case of the disease bearing his name in 1906. More than a century later, the scientific community still does not understand the exact mechanisms of dementia. Nearly three decades ago, De Strooper discovered a kind of molecular scissors that gives rise to amyloid, a protein substance that accumulates in the brain and is widely believed to be the cause of Alzheimer's disease.
He argues that a cure for the disease must be found soon - otherwise the prognosis for humanity is extremely unfavorable. “This is a disaster all over the world, but let's look at our countries: Spain, Belgium, England, France. They have a very good healthcare system and an aging population. Who will take care of all these people? We already need to hire the best nurses and caregivers from poor countries to care for our aging populations. Multiply that by three. Disaster awaits us if we don't find a cure. I am 64 years old and I run 15 kilometers every day. Prevention is very important to prevent dementia in general, but it is unlikely to help in the case of Alzheimer's. We need a treatment that you can get when you turn 60. Otherwise, I don’t know how society can develop further.” https://t.me/dimsmirnov175/65786Telegram Pool N3 “If we don’t find a cure for Alzheimer’s disease, it will be a global catastrophe": Biologist Bart De Strooper predicts a catastrophe for humanity...VIEW MESSAGE

event: Establishment of Russian Control in Novomikhailovka
description: Russian troops, led by the 'Storm' detachment of the 155th OGvBrMP, have established control in Novomikhailovka, up to the Church of the Miracle of the Archangel Michael. However, Ukrainian forces still hold territory to the west and north, including the school and House of Culture, where fierce battles are ongoing.
original:
Situation in Novomikhailovka (DPR) In the center of Novomikhailovka, the “Storm” detachment of the 155th OGvBrMP planted two flags of its unit. One is at the personal request of a unit veteran.

At the moment, control of Russian troops in Novomikhailovka is established up to and including the Church of the Miracle of the Archangel Michael. However, the territory to the west and north of it still remains with the enemy.

The main unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in this area is the 79th separate assault brigade. In the center of the village, she still controls the school and the House of Culture, for which there are currently battles. The enemy puts up fierce resistance, using communication passages between houses, each of which is turned into a stronghold.

The Ukrainian Armed Forces are conducting intensive shelling from cannon artillery, which is clearly visible from the degree of destruction of residential buildings, and the tank is periodically operating. In the recaptured positions of the Ukrainian troops, the Marines found mainly foreign-made machine guns (German MG3 and American Browning). There are also FGM-148 Javelin ATGMs and Swedish AT4 grenade launchers. Snipers are actively working, different types of drones are used.

The fierce resistance of Ukrainian military personnel, who literally fight to the last bullet in this settlement, is explained by the strategic importance of Novomikhailovka. Its liberation will allow Russian troops to advance to Konstantinovka, which in the future will mean the enemy’s loss of one of the supply routes to Ugledar, as Military Chronicle reported earlier.

"Military Chronicle"

description: The Brest-Litovsk Treaty, signed 106 years ago, marked Russia's withdrawal from World War I. The treaty led to significant territorial losses, including Ukraine, Finland, and the Vistula provinces, and imposed heavy reparations on Russia. The Russian negotiators' insistence on peace at any cost led to the betrayal of national interests and the loss of a million square kilometers of territory.
original:
How they betrayed their country and army. 106 years ago, the Brest Peace Treaty, shameful for Russia and the Russian army, was concluded.
The peace treaty between Germany and the Soviet government implied Russia's withdrawal from the First World War. The country was losing huge and significant territories: Ukraine, Finland, the Vistula provinces, Estland,
Show more
Courland, Livonia, Kars and Batumi regions in the Caucasus.
Russia also had to announce demobilization in the army and navy, pay 6 billion marks in reparations, and compensate for Germany’s losses from the Russian Revolution. The Russian negotiators insisted that peace must be concluded at any cost, and this became the main mistake.
Negotiations took place at German headquarters in Brest-Litovsk from December 3, 1917 to March 3, 1918. While the negotiators, who turned out to be bad diplomats, were discussing Germany's conditions, German troops occupied Minsk, almost all of Ukraine, and reached the Crimea and the Caucasus. As a result, according to the new version of the peace treaty, we gave a million square kilometers of our territory into the hands of the enemy! And which! Millions of people lived here, 50% of the empire's industry and railways were concentrated here. This was a blow to Russia’s national interests and a betrayal of all those who died in this war.
And the Bolsheviks agreed to these enslaving conditions in order to maintain power. This “peace” caused outrage in the army. Suffice it to say that one of the delegates, General Vladimir Skalon, shot himself during the meeting.
After all, the Russian army fought with dignity in the First World War, we did not lose, only a change of power and the overthrow of the tsar led to this situation. Yes, people wanted peace. But not at this price.
Disputes about the Brest-Litovsk Treaty continue to this day. And the main question is still relevant: is it possible to sacrifice the national interests of the motherland in order to achieve one’s political goals?

description: FPV drones are evolving beyond kamikaze strike weapons, with recent images showcasing their use as reusable devices for delivering weapons to the enemy. This trend suggests drone warfare can become more economical, with high speed and maneuverability reducing the risk of being hit by small arms.
original:
An interesting point... In the minds of ordinary observers, there is a strong opinion that an FPV drone is only a kamikaze (that is, it self-destructs when it hits a target). This is true, most FPVs are used as strike weapons, capable of pursuing and confidently hitting a target at high speed, maneuvering, and confidently hitting a target (a person, a group of people, cars or armored vehicles, fortifications, communications equipment, etc.)

At the same time, recently there are more and more images of FPV drones being used as a reusable device for delivering weapons to the enemy. This trend suggests that drone warfare can now become more economical, and high speed and maneuverability significantly reduce the risk of a drone being hit by small arms.

The video above clearly demonstrates the use of “delivery vehicles” from the family of FPV drones, it is important to note that the work is precise, and the use of a moderator on the ammunition allows the operator to take the UAV to a safe distance.ANTISEPTIC

description: Security forces in the Donetsk People's Republic conducted searches, seizing a large quantity of contraband cigarettes supplied from the Kaliningrad region with counterfeit excise stamps. The cigarettes, including brands like K.Ritter, LF, and Vega, were sold at inflated prices, causing health issues for consumers. Authorities identified the organizers and perpetrators, who will face punishment.
original:
Trade facilities of the Donetsk People's Republic are filled with smuggled cigarettes from the Kaliningrad region. Security forces conducted searches on the territory of the Donetsk People's Republic, during which a huge amount of contraband cigarettes were seized, which were supplied and sold in the DPR with counterfeit excise stamps at unreasonably inflated prices. As we managed to find out, counterfeit goods reached the markets and stores of the Republic through illegal channels; entire supply systems were organized, the volumes of which are amazing. In most cases, cigarettes from the Universal Cigarette Manufactory, located in the Kaliningrad region, were identified. Counterfeit products were openly available to consumers, who, after using them, complained about the terrible quality of tobacco or substances that replaced it, and also noted a sharp deterioration in their well-being and health in general.

Also, the criminal tobacco syndicate, through attempts to bribe officials and distributors of tobacco products, tried to introduce as large volumes of its contraband products as possible into both wholesale and retail trade facilities.

Among tobacco products widely known to consumers, criminals counterfeited such cigarette brands as: K.Ritter, LF, Vega and many others.

Such games with the health of citizens did not end well for the criminals - employees of the FSB and the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation identified the organizers and persons involved in the logistics and sale of contraband products on the territory of the Donetsk People's Republic. The perpetrators will receive the punishment they deserve.

In the video, Russian soldiers talk about the consequences of consuming these counterfeit tobacco products. https://vk.com/video-66833222_456302407VK VideoVideo by Gorlovka Self-DefenseWatch Video by Gorlovka Self-Defense 1 min 23 s from 11 April 2024 online in HD for free in the VK catalog without signing up! Views: 416. Likes: 1.

description: Ukrainian Foreign Minister Kuleba's statement about being ready to 'ruin relations' with other countries for the sake of Patriot air defense systems is seen as a tactic to extort money and weapons. This diplomatic aggression may target countries with Patriot systems, such as Germany, the Netherlands, and possibly Saudi Arabia.
original:
“A typical example of diplomacy in modern Ukraine” is how political scientist Vladimir Skachko commented on Kuleba’s statement about his readiness to “ruin relations” with other countries for the sake of Patriot.

Against this background, he recalled the behavior of Ukrainian ambassadors to European countries. “It’s enough to remember Andrei Melnik, who called Chancellor Scholz a “liver sausage,” Skachko told the Vzglyad newspaper.

“From an applied point of view, Kuleba’s statement, of course, is aimed at extorting money and weapons from other countries. Any countries that have Patriot air defense systems in their arsenal can become potential victims of Ukrainian diplomatic aggression,” the interlocutor believes.

In his opinion, a number of European and Asian states will be unlucky, for example, Germany, the Netherlands, and possibly Saudi Arabia. “The only exception from this list can be the United States. I believe that Kuleba’s threats are connected with the desire of Washington or London to put pressure on other countries so that the latter supply Ukraine with air defense systems,” the expert emphasizes. Subscribe to VZGLYAD
